div.p:
Welcome to Stanley-Boyd Area Schools. You will see the words, “Every Child Will Learn at a High Level” throughout our website. That is more than a motto. It is what we believe. It is what we do. It is who we are.
Jeff Koenig, Superintendent

p.span: Even though we weren't able to be in the classroom on Earth Day, the first graders we were able to do a virtual webbing activity before Storytime on ways to take care of our Earth! Happy Earth Day...
Homeschooling can be so much fun! This week in first grade, our essential question was "What Inventions do you know about?” We have been learning about 3-D shapes so this young lad put both ideas...
It’s a great day to graduate an Oriole! We are so proud of Branden Knez for planning to start his career. The Stanley-Boyd Staff would like to wish you well and congratulate you for all that you...
Thank you in advance for participating in our parent survey before May 15, 2020. #SBOrioles

Mrs. Fitzsimmons, Mrs. Ceranski, Nurse Karyn, Ms. Pikal, and Mrs. Castellano miss you all very much. We decided it was a great time for us to read a book. Oh The Things You Can Do That Are Good For...
The #SBOrioles band is music to our ears! #ThrowbackThursday

It’s a great day to graduate an Oriole! We are so proud of Ashley Anderson for being accepted at UW-Eau Claire to major in Elementary Education. The Stanley-Boyd Staff would like to wish you well and...
Which came first, the chicken or the egg? Distancing learning is growing each of us in so many areas! #SBOrioles
If you truly love nature, you will find beauty everywhere. -Vincent van Gogh #EarthDay #SBOrioles
These #SBOrioles fourth graders found some creative ways to do math at home!
The challenge last week was to build a tower as tall as us, using any household object. This fourth grader used books to make a tower TALLER than she is! #SBOrioles

Wednesday, April 22 celebrates the 50th Earth Day. This year, #SBOrioles students will not be able to celebrate Earth Day in the classroom. Please check out this Google site for students and parents...
We love the imagination of our #SBOrioles! 🧡🖤
Our first grade #SBOrioles working on some fantastic hands on learning! Our families and staff are incredible! 💯
